title: The Astrology Collection
summary: Astrology is a collection of my ideas and personal projects. I like to built things in my spare time. Writing computer programs is a great way to build things. However, engineering is more than software...

events.name: Taurus
events.summary: A windows PE application to backup/restore system images.

events.name: Gemini
events.summary: A set of small programs doing small things.

events.name: Libra
events.summary: A universal Windows platform app for viewing/annotating PDFs.

events.name: Sagittarius
events.summary: An Adobe Lightroom plugin to GeoTag photos with Google location history data.

events.name: Capricorn
events.summary: Snake, the once-popular game in grandfather's Nokia cellphone.
